documents.document: This will keep me awake at night. https://t.co/ljLghUujhi
Good to know: the keeper still gets a BOOM! at BC Place, @JoeCannonGK1 !
Could hear the horns out at Production Way Skytrain station today! https://t.co/lJze7ozm6e
Trudeau the Elder https://t.co/DMZMmag8jT
The universe is shaped exactly like the earth: if you go straight long enough you'll end up where you were. @modestmouseband #mixtape day
I probably started counting when I lived in this neighbourhood, so I've come full circle! 40,075km #circumference… https://t.co/oMZskhPXEs
It's here, it's here! Norse Mythology by @neilhimself arrived early. However, I showed it to my 10y-o and he won't give it back!
A change of pace https://t.co/3GSWwEz5ZG
Looking up "questions the border patrol can ask" as an afternoon activity. Though any advice is probably obsolete now.
Hold to this truth. https://t.co/j7nPFhKMKO
The score levels in the 2nd, making for a close run of play, but Dynamo put together some fine passing (w our centre mid!) and take it 3-1!
Pressure pays off as @CMFSC U11 Dynamo net the first goal on a bright grey morning.
Playing an old mix. 25yrs ago, we sang out @billybragg's "you're a dedicated follower of fascism!" with irony. Now: not so much.
@AltNatParkSer Our family road trip to @YellowstoneNPS last summer was truly great, thanks to the people of the NPS.
I can still wear my @WhitecapsFC jersey! Koffie is 28 again. https://t.co/HSqI7AWucw
Second half goals delivah a thrillah for Dyanamo to overcome an equally matched Lyon side! 2-1 final, and one of the best of the season.
Back to @CMFSC play on a cold morning! Dynamo are up 1-0 at half in a tight game, as the showers slide down from snow-topped mountains.
Nope, nope! Boycotting all political coverage today! (I hope all the good memes survive until tomorrow.)
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE! RT @RealGDT: Informal poll (let's see how many votes we get in 24 hours) Hellboy III
Giving poutine a bad name! But I am hungry now. https://t.co/0RlbqAs8RS
Wait a m-! * squinting* https://t.co/X7VOJTciDR
Another glorious failure! https://t.co/xwukHpd7Fp
Guaranteed: full coverage of the woodwork and he'll catch every drop. https://t.co/HV3XJmfDB1
I like roller coasters but maybe I'll give this one a miss. https://t.co/4yFkylrWAx
5 minutes, if you're still walking in a straight line. https://t.co/rmBjD9NSqc
Listening to Weezer's Pinkerton and the 10y-o catches the Green Day AND the Public Enemy name drops. Three hits for #indierockdad!
West coast winter hack #42: park in the underground lot while grocery shopping, until the snow & ice melt off the car.
Wave your hands in the air If you know the song Like you just don't care. https://t.co/AUqshQ3CKv

Sir, your reverie of meat has been epic this eve.
But truly: are you a quitter?
A quitter of meat??
https://t.co/p5uxNEUzYk
And a couple personal additions. https://t.co/6yItUSZQDq
I checked: from Wishful Drinking. https://t.co/CGNXlX1n8p
How can it NOT be Bill Murray?? https://t.co/Dmf2TFRI9S
Medicating this cold with Christmas candy and coffee at the office this morning.
The snowflakes are getting big and fluffy. "Like kittens, falling from the sky." What?!? "Hey, you asked."
Party on! (For engineers) https://t.co/92ErPscQbu
The crux of the dilemma. https://t.co/802MqaHS9z
Merry Christmas fear. https://t.co/Hz48iw3tW6
The etymology of "gas lighting". https://t.co/eZZEcpbNCZ
Life behind bars. Decent commute though! #bikeyvr #bcstorm (#notreally) https://t.co/gBhVYTlAjs
Then the rush wears off...

Busy morning, so put off my first cup of coffee until 12:47pm.
WHAT WAS I THINKING?!? I'M NO QUITTER! MOAR!
All the bike riders in the office say, Yeah! #bikeyvr #snowpocalypse
Retracting brake caliper on the Jetta in rain and failing light. Reminded of Clive Barker's puzzle box in Scarlet Gospels. Coincidence?!
Our forward went down hard in their box just before the half, as the Dynamo put together another goal. Up and at it again for 2nd half!
Great passing and overwhelming pressure put the @CMFSC BU11 Dynamo up at the half. Again.
Not through the Burrard Inlet. https://t.co/6eO0aWcX57
I think I need to wash the car. It's gathering some dirt. https://t.co/cXuZVvseT8
The @CMFSC BU11 Dynamo press their advantage in the 2nd half, scoring 2 more to finish a cold & wet game.
The Dynamo are held 2-1 at the half, versus a tough @CMFSC Celtic side. Push on, lads!
Hey neighbour... https://t.co/gJ0gPb38Mt
Gonna be sick of fish for dinner... https://t.co/Il2ocog4TI
Sure-fire way to get square with the Bureau for messing with the election: Presidential pardon for Leonard Peltier this year.
I remember having breakfast in Kaikoura. "State of emergency declared in town cut off by NZ earthquake" https://t.co/cdbYvsJLJs Best wishes.
Making a list of news organizations to support, like I would for charities.
The Dynamo keepers earned their clean sheet today, as the forwards' pressure deliver a 4-0 victory against a stubborn opponent!
Our keeper pulls out a big save to hold the score 1-0 at the half for @CMFSC BU11 Dynamo! https://t.co/EM3Tke1QeI
Game on, Dynamo! And the sun breaks through for @CMFSC BU11 this afternoon. https://t.co/0lRAyo0Oyn
If we ask every Rep voter what they expect the new gov't to achieve, then see how it pans out in 4yr, can people learn something? Finally??
Good to know. https://t.co/uGGPNUFMnZ
I can hear the Harvards flying overhead, some distance away, echoing in and out as the wind changes. #lestweforget
Some good news https://t.co/kS5V0hFE46
Not reassuring anyone. Fair enough. https://t.co/qoVaf0w85B
FFS, America... No. I got nothing to say to you right now.
If you're going to drive a tricked-out BMW, be like this guy. https://t.co/VWKKRfK9FP
I feel bad. Just finished cursing out the salesguy, said there were Revellos in the freezer. He wasn't "lying"; he was "selling". My bad.
I think you can full stop after "...no idea." https://t.co/1q2KRkyz1N
The @VSOrchestra is rehearsing before screening Raiders. The horns played a snippet of Indy's theme and I- I got the feels.
Introducing the kids to Indy with the @VSOrchestra for Raiders of the Lost Ark! https://t.co/riYYbLDDuo
A handy reference to English Facebook! https://t.co/FElUqVjPnh
"The most interesting information comes from children, for they tell all they know and then stop." - Mark Twain https://t.co/dT733E6GkU
Enjoyed the tourtière by @chefenrick for dinner on a rainy night! And the chicken pie earlier this week. Recommende… https://t.co/5E5g8gJ4RU
2true, @FatMike_of_NOFX ! 'All my secrets are out there, I've lost all pride&shame, 2 things no one should have' https://t.co/I4AXBTG94B
A bit of rain on the mountain for @CMFSC BU11 Dynamo today. Hustle, hustle, boys! https://t.co/5YVyb9OydD
The long precursor to this chaotic US election by @SKendzior https://t.co/FhJET47Irt https://t.co/Jg3knJ0YSV
Awesome. It waited 5 minutes after practice started to start raining. #thatsfootie
Belated thanks for playing @gorddownie's "Seven Matches" for the morning drive, @evolution1079 . Started the day.
I've spent the whole work day in my cycling gear. It's as if, subconsciously, I'm ready to drop tools and run for freedom at any moment.
Twitter, tonight. https://t.co/eiBqRnskOr

Guy at work described Hallowe'en terror: his 15y-o daughter dressed up as Harley Quinn.
I've no doubt she will use that bat!
Wearing my @Powells tee in honour of@SnarkySteff as she begins her 2nd year as a nomad, travelling the world!
Getting his @David_Ousted on, building the wall in the rain as they practice free kicks! (Tak, David!) https://t.co/nRDUdacFxm
Finally made the Ironworkers' sidewalk navigable, now someone decides it's too much to provide access!! #bikeyvr 2/2
Btw, who decided to close half the Ironworkers' sidewalk to cyclists?! #bikeyvr 1/2
Decent commute to meet my new #UBC mentoring students this evening! Extra bonus: introducing them to Benny's Bagels. https://t.co/TRUV4lh5PE
With a sprinkling of dignity over top to sweeten that season-ending swallow of pride. https://t.co/8EopZcbbGq
A pretty good way to end the season, @WhitecapsFC ! Thanks, gentlemen. #vwfc
Enjoy a glass from one of the Okanagan vineyards, @ericidle! https://t.co/FK599erMUn
There was an Indiana Jones treatment based on this but Harrison Ford "didn't want to return to Hoth". https://t.co/1leOmxZBZO

Start with the rule, for safety. Then drivers can lobby WITH cyclists for 1m lanes, for new infrastructure. https://t.co/Y5b8aIvonE
Two rockets in the opening minutes put @cmfsc BU11 Dynamo up early. Now into the second half, and our opponents are pushing back!
Walking laps in the rain, listening to #Soundgarden's Birth Ritual on my Seattle Soundtrack mix. Apropos. https://t.co/9Sr3MeRH3p
Creeptastic! ITSAZOO Invites Audiences into Their Own, Personal Horror Film: Theatre Event: - Hidden https://t.co/UBN0O30z3j

If you would, @TheTyee, it's a US tug in BC waters. https://t.co/sA7hE04VKv
What are they filming at @zulurecords tonight?! Trucks & lights on 4th as I rode home tonight.
...Flattering and all but hey, I'm not your type! I mean, Married. Kids. And dude, I'm a DUDE!
Riding the Kawi home from UBC, an Acura starts flashing lights and bipping his horn. Uhm, is that a pick-up line, or...? 'Cause, dude...
We still have a crack at this?! All right then! https://t.co/8B4HEbR8r3
